data.title: Documentation
data.description: [Laravel Streams](https://streams.dev/) has growing documentation and tutorials. Whether you are new to the framework or have previous experience with Laravel, we recommend reading all the documentation from beginning to end.

data.title: User Interface
data.description: [Streams UI](https://streams.dev/docs/ui) provides a versatile and easy-to-use component system, including a framework for building control panels. UI Components let you quickly make reactive and data-driven components.

data.title: API
data.description: [Streams API](https://streams.dev/docs/api) provides a universal RESTful API for streams and streams. Use the native Javascript library to streamline interaction with the API. Flexible authentication, cashing, and configuration let you stand up APIs in minutes.

data.title: REPL + SDK
data.description: [Streams SDK](https://streams.dev/docs/sdk) brings speed and precision to your Laravel application development workflow. So start tinkering and prototyping right away with the LAST stack.
